entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-12-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Tests failed in CI: restore failed with Response status code does not indicate success: 409 (Public access is not permitted on this storage account #45417

Closed

  • Hot Reload Target Process is wrong on MacOs #45399
  • dotnet 9 fails on macOS Catalina due to a missing symbol in libc++ #45382

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix a set of test issues caused by an old blob feed and try to fix up the nullable change we rushed in #45420
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [DO NOT MERGE} Skip a few tests on osx #45419
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, DO NOT MERGE
  • Read global.json to decide to run dotnet test in vstest or testing platform mode #45418
    Area-DotNet Test, config-system-candidate
  • [release/9.0.1xx] Upgrade latest Alpine to 3.21 for VMR builds #45416
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Upgrade latest Alpine to 3.21 for VMR builds #45415
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Initialization Stopwatch class #45413
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [WASM] Clean up of `HybridGlobalization` in tests #45412
    Area-Infrastructure, arch-wasm, untriaged, 10.0.1xx
  • Do not automatically add nuget.org as a package source when it is absent from nuget.config Fixes #44312 #45410
    untriaged, Area-Templates
  • Add netcoreapp9.1 tfm to It_fails_to_build_if_targeting_a_higher_framework_than_is_supported test #45409
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • [main] Unlock build failed due to enabling nullable #45411
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Restore detailed test logging to console output #45343
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • format: stop checking for dotnet cli version #44958
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Run all steps in a container #44969
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix manifest artifacts reading #45407
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/9.0.1xx] Fix incorrect apphost being used when publishing for self-contained single-file with `NoBuild=true` #45400
    Servicing-consider, untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • [release/9.0.2xx] Copy dump file to the Helix upload location #45385
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Use legacy WASM APIs when newer ones are not available #45317
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Fixes middleware invocation arguments use by legacy apply update code path #45298
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • File watcher improvements #45131
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Remove global usings from projects building source packages #45339
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.2xx' => 'main' #45365
    untriaged, Area-CodeFlow
  • Use library-packs also when RestoreAdditionalProjectSources is explicitly set. #44863
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [9.0.2xx] sln migrate, sln list, sln add #45408
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add VMR leg that builds test projects #44843
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Support package@version syntax for dotnet workload search/update/install version Fixes #42367 #45156
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • sln-remove: Support for slnx #45160
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add hook for importing .props file after .NET SDK props #45151
    untriaged, Area-ILLink, consider-for-documentation
  • Dotnet test integration 2 #45398
    Area-DotNet Test, untriaged
  • Dotnet test integration (first part) #44268
    Area-DotNet Test, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.1xx' => 'release/9.0.2xx' #45392
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Enable Nullable Reference Types in Test Projects #44862
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Prepare GenAPI so it can be used for a new assembly diff generator #45389
    untriaged, Team:Runtime, Area-Tools
  • [release/9.0.1xx] [FIX] tool-update: Compare tool versions correctly #45383
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
